hero.title: Building web apps that scale
hero.subtitle: I turn ideas into production-ready web applications. Specializing in React, Node.js, and modern cloud architecture. From MVP to enterprise, I build fast, secure, and maintainable code.
hero.imageAlt: Developer workspace with multiple monitors showing code

about.title: Web Development Expertise
about.subtitle: Building the modern web
about.content: I'm Alex, a full-stack developer with 8+ years building web applications for startups and established businesses. I specialize in React, Node.js, TypeScript, and AWS. Clean code, robust architecture, and user experience are my priorities.

products.name: MVP Development
products.description: Build your minimum viable product with React frontend and Node.js backend. Includes deployment and 30 days support.

products.name: Custom Web Application
products.description: Full-featured web app with authentication, database, API, and admin dashboard. Production-ready code.

products.name: API Development
products.description: RESTful or GraphQL API with documentation, authentication, and database integration.

products.name: Frontend Development
products.description: Responsive React application from Figma designs. Component library, state management, and API integration.

products.name: Technical Consulting
products.description: Hourly consulting for architecture reviews, code audits, or technical strategy. Minimum 10 hours.

products.name: Maintenance & Support
products.description: Monthly retainer for ongoing development, bug fixes, and feature additions.

services.subtitle: Modern web development for ambitious projects

testimonials.title: Client Feedback
testimonials.subtitle: Projects delivered on time and on budget

items.text: Alex built our SaaS MVP in 8 weeks and it's been rock solid. Clean code, great communication, and genuinely cares about the product. Can't recommend enough!
items.author: Rachel Kim
items.title: CTO, TechStartup

items.text: Needed a complex API for our mobile app. Alex delivered ahead of schedule with comprehensive documentation. The code quality is exceptional.
items.author: Marcus Johnson
items.title: Product Manager

items.text: Working with Alex felt like having a senior developer on our team. Proactive, detail-oriented, and solved problems we didn't even know we had.
items.author: Sofia Martinez
items.title: Founder, E-commerce Platform

members.name: Alex Thompson
members.title: Full-Stack Developer
members.bio: CS degree from MIT. 8+ years building scalable web applications. Former senior engineer at a YC-backed startup. Passionate about clean code, performance, and developer experience.
